product_name: Look SPX 12 B120 Downhill Ski Bindings - 2014/2015
long_description: High-performance downhill bindings with a 3.5 - 12 DIN range and 120mm brakes, the SPX 12 B120 bindings offer advanced skiers responsive performance and a cutting-edge design.
short_description: High-performance downhill bindings with a 3.5 - 12 DIN range and 120mm brakes, the SPX 12 B120 bindings offer advanced skiers responsive performance and a cutting-edge design.
